# codex-workstation-bootstrap
> Production-ready Codex bootstrap and mirror for macOS with strict OS-first payload hierarchy.

## Canonical entrypoints

- /README.md
- /CONTRIBUTING.md
- /SECURITY.md
- /CHANGELOG.md

## Setup docs

- /docs/setup/PORTABLE_SETUP.md
- /docs/setup/PROD_RUNBOOK.md
- /docs/setup/os/macos.md

## Runtime payload

- /codex/os/macos/runtime/config/config.template.toml
- /codex/os/macos/runtime/agents/global.AGENTS.md
- /codex/os/macos/runtime/rules/default.rules
- /codex/os/macos/runtime/skills/manifests/custom-skills.manifest.txt
- /codex/os/common/agents/codex-agents/README.md

## Automation scripts

- /scripts/bootstrap.sh
- /scripts/install.sh
- /scripts/verify.sh
- /scripts/export-from-local.sh
- /scripts/self-test.sh

## Project intent keywords

- codex
- mcp
- macos bootstrap
- developer environment
- agentic coding
- deterministic setup
- workstation provisioning
